title: Modular Casual Cloth Pack for Shenya
description: Modular Casual Cloth Pack for Shenya, can be use for office wear or street wear
longDescription:
_______________ ❤ Youtube Showcase ❤ _______________


  • ❝ UE Casual Cloth Pack1 for Female Character Shenya ❞


_______________ ⚠️IMPORTANT NOTE _______________


REQUIRED ASSET: Shenya


This cloth pack only works with Shenya. It wouldn't work with any other characters and no support will be provided for integration with any other characters.


Content:

  • 4x Tops (T-Shirt, Button Up, Crop Top, Knitted Top)
  • 3x Bottoms (2 Skirts & 1 Short pants)
  • 1x Face Mask
  • 2x Glasses
  • 2x Scarfs
  • 1x Bag
  • 1x Shoe
  • Total: 14 New Mesh


All the meshes above are assigned Shenya's Skeleton which is compatible with UE4 Mannequin's Skeleton.


Updates

  • 2024-08-26: Fix broken blendshapes specific to UE5.4


_______________ 🛈 Polycount _______________


  • Bag (4.8k Tris)
  • T-Shirt (3.5k Tris)
  • Button Up (8.8k Tris)
  • Crop Top (1.4k Tris)
  • Knitted Top (or Knitshirt) (5.4k Tris)
  • Face Mask (0.8k Tris)
  • Scarf 1 (6.2k Tris)
  • Scarf2 (6.2k Tris)
  • Glasses1 (1.5k Tris)
  • Glasses2 (1.7k Tris)
  • Shortpants (2.3k Tris)
  • Skirt1 (3.6k Tris)
  • Skirt2 (2.4k Tris)
  • Shoe (7.4k Tris)


_______________ ˚₊‧꒰ა ⭐ Morph Targets (Blendshapes) ⭐ ໒꒱ ‧₊˚ _______________


  • Some of the clothing uses Morph Targets to fit with other clothing. For example there are a few morph targets for button up: one to fit it to the short pants, one to fit it to the jeans and one to fit it to the skirts.
  • More about the morph targets is in the documentation.


_______________ ˚₊‧꒰ა ⭐ Textures & Materials ⭐ ໒꒱ ‧₊˚ _______________


  • Textures and Materials use the same settings as the one in Shenya.
  • PBR (Physically Based Rendering) Metallic/Roughness Textures
  • 2k Textures
  • RGB Maps for color tint in the material


_______________ ˗ˏˋ ꒰ 💌 ꒱ ˎˊ˗_______________


❤ Feel free to email miicaneo@gmail.com for any issues and inquiries. ❤

* Fbx source files will be provided on request *
technicalDetails:
Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: Yes

Animated: No

Number of characters: 1

Vertex counts of characters: ranging from 500+ to 5000+

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 69 Material Instances and 6 Materials

Number of Textures: 149 + 10 tiling textures for scarf

Texture Resolutions: all 2048x2048

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://miica37.github.io/docs/shenya/cloth-pack1/

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
